name: Battle Tank Wars by Galactic Droids
name_original: Battle Tank Wars by Galactic Droids
description:
Tank Wars

Navigate you tank around lots of exciting levels, shooting enemy tanks and anything else that might get in your way!

Another great from our arcade game series inspired by tank games such as battle zone and tank commander.

This is a fast paced tank game, its easy to play, just dive straight in and start shooing.

Good Luck.
